quotes.quote: The dog's kennel is not the place to keep a sausage.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: To live long, eat like a cat, drink like a dog.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Three things it is best to avoid: a strange dog, a flood, and a man who thinks he is wise.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb

quotes.quote: The dog wags his tail, not for you, but for your bread.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: The barking of a dog does not disturb the man on a camel.
quotes.author: Egyptian Proverb

quotes.quote: Children aren't dogs; adults aren't gods.
quotes.author: Haitian Proverb

quotes.quote: Beware of a silent dog and still water.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: The greater love is a mother's; then comes a dog's; then a sweetheart's.
quotes.author: Polish Proverb

quotes.quote: One dog barks at something, the rest bark at him.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not respond to a barking dog.
quotes.author: Moroccan Jewish saying

quotes.quote: Only mad dogs and Englishmen go out in the noonday sun.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Those who sleep with dogs will rise with fleas.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Show a dog a finger, and he wants the whole hand.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: If you are a host to your guest, be a host to his dog also.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: A house without either a cat or a dog is the house of a scoundrel.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: An honest man is not the worse because a dog barks at him.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Every dog is allowed one bite.
quotes.author: US Proverb

quotes.quote: A good dog deserves a good bone.
quotes.author: US Proverb

quotes.quote: If you stop every time a dog barks, your road will never end.
quotes.author: Saudi Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: Dog does not eat dog.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Give a dog a bad name and hang him.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Why keep a dog and bark yourself?
quotes.author: Proverb
